title: Synthetic Assets with Overmind
description: Explore Overmind, a synthetic asset protocol on Aptos that enables users to create, trade, and manage tokenized synthetic assets that track the price of real-world assets without requiring ownership of the underlying asset.

tasks.title: Prepare for Synthetic Trading
tasks.description: Add at least 0.1 APT to your wallet to begin exploring Overmind's synthetic assets

tasks.title: Synthetic Assets Basics
tasks.question: What are synthetic assets in the context of Overmind?
options: Physical commodities stored in vaults
Tokenized derivatives that track the price of real-world assets without owning the underlying asset
Artificial tokens with no price correlation
Commodities available only in virtual reality
tasks.correctAnswer: Tokenized derivatives that track the price of real-world assets without owning the underlying asset

tasks.title: Asset Types
tasks.description: Learn about the types of assets that can be synthesized
tasks.question: What types of assets might be available as synthetics on Overmind?
options: Only cryptocurrencies
Only stable assets pegged to USD
Stocks, commodities, forex, cryptocurrencies, and indices
Only NFTs
tasks.correctAnswer: Stocks, commodities, forex, cryptocurrencies, and indices

tasks.title: Collateralization
tasks.question: How are synthetic assets typically collateralized on Overmind?
options: They are not collateralized
With physical assets in custodial storage
With overcollateralization using cryptocurrencies or stablecoins
With personal credit scores
tasks.correctAnswer: With overcollateralization using cryptocurrencies or stablecoins

tasks.title: Price Oracles
tasks.question: How does Overmind determine the price of synthetic assets?
options: Through user voting
Using price oracles like Pyth Network to get real-world asset prices
Based on supply and demand within Overmind only
Through manual price setting by the team
tasks.correctAnswer: Using price oracles like Pyth Network to get real-world asset prices

tasks.title: Minting Synthetics
tasks.description: Understanding how to create synthetic assets
tasks.question: How are synthetic assets typically created (minted) on Overmind?
options: They are only created by the team
By buying them from centralized exchanges
By providing collateral and minting synthetics at current oracle prices
Through mining with computational power
tasks.correctAnswer: By providing collateral and minting synthetics at current oracle prices

tasks.title: Liquidation Mechanisms
tasks.question: What happens if collateral value falls below required levels in Overmind?
options: Nothing, the protocol absorbs losses
The user's position can be liquidated to maintain system solvency
New synthetic assets are created to cover the shortfall
Trading is temporarily disabled
tasks.correctAnswer: The user's position can be liquidated to maintain system solvency

tasks.title: Trading Synthetic Assets
tasks.question: How can users typically trade synthetic assets on Overmind?
options: Only against the native Overmind token
Only peer-to-peer with other users
Against stablecoins and other synthetics on DEXes integrated with Overmind
Only through centralized exchanges
tasks.correctAnswer: Against stablecoins and other synthetics on DEXes integrated with Overmind

tasks.title: Benefits of Synthetics
tasks.description: Learn about advantages of synthetic assets
tasks.question: What is a key benefit of trading synthetic assets on Overmind?
options: They are always less volatile than real assets
Access to global assets that might be difficult to trade in traditional markets, with 24/7 trading
Government insurance against losses
They always increase in value
tasks.correctAnswer: Access to global assets that might be difficult to trade in traditional markets, with 24/7 trading

tasks.title: Implementation Technology
tasks.question: How is Overmind implemented on the Aptos blockchain?
options: Using Solidity smart contracts
As a fully centralized service with off-chain settlement
Using Move modules for on-chain execution and settlement
Through manual trading operations
tasks.correctAnswer: Using Move modules for on-chain execution and settlement
